body:
Currently we have a single "Save" button. When you click this button it saves the changes you have made and flashes a message to let you know it has saved successfully.

I would like to change the behavior so that, when you click the "Save" button, it takes you back to the recipe details page after it successfully saves your changes.

In addition we should add a "Save and Continue" button that works the way the current "Save" button works.

Currently we have a single "Save" button. When you click this button it saves the changes you have made and flashes a message to let you know it has saved successfully.

I would like to change the behavior so that, when you click the "Save" button, it takes you back to the recipe details page after it successfully saves your changes.

In addition we should add a "Save and Continue" button that works the way the current "Save" button works.
